mapper.select:
WITH CHILD_M AS (SELECT M.* FROM TB_SYS_MENU M INNER JOIN TB_SYS_ROLE_MENU RM ON M.MENU_CODE = RM.MENU_CODE INNER JOIN TB_SYS_USER_ROLE UR ON RM.ROLEID = UR.ROLEID WHERE UR.USERID = #{userId} AND M.STATUS = '1'), PARENT_M AS (SELECT * FROM TB_SYS_MENU M WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CHILD_M CM WHERE M.MENU_CODE = CM.UP_MENU_CODE))
SELECT M.MENU_CODE, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_DESC, M.MENU_URL, M.UP_MENU_CODE, M.MENU_LEVEL, M.STATUS, DECODE(MN.CHILDCO, NULL, 0, 1) CHILDCODE FROM (SELECT * FROM CHILD_M UNION SELECT * FROM PARENT_M) M LEFT JOIN (SELECT UP_MENU_CODE, COUNT(1) CHILDCO FROM TB_SYS_MENU WHERE UP_MENU_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UP_MENU_CODE) MN ON MN.UP_MENU_CODE = M.MENU_CODE ORDER BY M.MENU_LEVEL, M.MENU_CODE

SELECT M.MENU_CODE AS MENUCODE, M.MENU_NAME AS MENUNAME, M.MENU_DESC AS MENUDESC, M.MENU_URL AS MENUURL, M.UP_MENU_CODE AS UPMENUCODE, M.MENU_LEVEL AS MENULEVEL, M.STATUS FROM TB_SYS_MENU M WHERE M.STATUS = '1' AND M.MENU_LEVEL = '1' order by M.MENU_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SYS_MENU (MENU_CODE, MENU_NAME, MENU_DESC, MENU_URL, UP_MENU_CODE, MENU_LEVEL, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_SYS_MENU_ID.NEXTVAL, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upMenuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1')
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CO) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) CO FROM TB_SYS_ROLE_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = #{menuCode} UNION SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_MENU WHERE UP_MENU_CODE = #{menuCode} AND STATUS= '1' )

SELECT M.MENU_CODE, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_DESC, M.MENU_URL, M.UP_MENU_CODE, M.MENU_LEVEL, DECODE(MN.CHILDCO, NULL, 0, 1) CHILDCODE FROM TB_SYS_MENU M LEFT JOIN (SELECT UP_MENU_CODE, COUNT(1) CHILDCO FROM TB_SYS_MENU WHERE UP_MENU_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UP_MENU_CODE) MN ON MN.UP_MENU_CODE = M.MENU_CODE WHERE M.STATUS = '1'
select ROLEID, MENU_CODE MENUCODE from TB_SYS_ROLE_MENU where roleId= #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SYS_ROLE_MENU WHERE ROLEID = #{ roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
